Statewide GA Rental Assistance is 2-3 months from being done. City of ATL United Way program will make last payments in December‚Ä¶incomes usually drop in January when seasonal jobs end/slash hours. Rents are still way up. Rent assistance agencies have to pay much more per

Your landlord/leasing office must participate so make sure they are onboard. Pay careful attention to the required docs. If you applied a while back but never heard anything, log in to see your status. Reach out to UW asap.
